body:
Lately, I've been seeing people being banned for things like "trolling" or "hacking."

It might just be me, but I'd prefer it if people used more description e.g "Team Grief - Breaking team crafting tables" instead of just trolling, or "Hacking - Click Aimbot."


Jussayin'

title: Elaborate on punishments

replies.body:
I personally put the hack they are using for hacking punishments.

For Team Griefing, the player getting punished knows what he did wrong most likely.
